channel.title: Stop npcs from walking through objects
channel.description: Anyone know how to do this i tried blocking them off then attacking they just ignore the wall and walk through em how do i stop this?

item.title: Stop npcs from walking through objects
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

That is the stupidest post i’ve ever seen, you’re basically repeating what he said…

That’s like someone posting a thread like “How do you add an item to the inventory when you click the fishing spot” and i reply with “You need to code it so when you click the fishing spot an item goes into the inventory”

-Sigh-

Read full topic
item.source: Stop npcs from walking through objects

@tben2004 wrote:

you have to code it so that npc can not go though some objects. I don’t know how to do this.
